title: How do u calm down if ur teammates feed hard every game for the week.. ( Please help )
body:
Hi guys..
I've been feeling quite sad these days because of teammates... been so tired to play league anymore due to unbalanced game making.
TBH i felt like killing my self yesterday, but i just smashed my keyboard...
Does anyone have any tips to make me feel better? I just want to enjoy a game, but people are all rushing in and feeding, loses and blames the back row doing nothing xD

I'm Plat 4 and teammates keep playing bad forcing ff@20, then i get put to low ELO playing with bronze and silver that instalock carry lanes eg. mid top. They just feed first-blood in less than 3 mins into game. If u guys don't trust me feel free to search "Lemon and Carrot"  match history and check every lost is because of some one feeding. Putting a plat against bronze and silver is hard to carry riot. Planning to quit league since riot system is broken.

Anyone have any good games to play? I'm tired of league, gonna switch a game before i spend anymore $$ for Christmas bundles.
Not gonna spend too much time on league, not suggesting it to friends due to unbalanced game play.

**Either fix or quit. Riot**

replies.body: I'd take a long break (a week or so) and then come back. If you still feel that way then I'd find another game to play. Since the most recent patches this game has been declining in the fun category so that could also be playing into it.
Chill out bro :) Play some arams with friends or normals with friends have a walk outside have fun...this what the game was made for to have fun and relax, not to worry and stress out.. bro chillix

> [{quoted}](name=Lemon and Carrot,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=faHx4tcE,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-12-22T12:23:25.944+0000)
> TBH i felt like killing my self yesterday, but i just smashed my keyboard...

If the game is annoying you this much - making you want to kill yourself; then stop playing it. 
You're climbing in ranked, so I don't really see a problem here.

Also, you can simply just play with trusted friends, and reduce your chances of coming across any "trolls." `You have 5 people on each team. If you're good, and your team mate is also good, you can carry that game. If you bring in 2 friends, that is 3 people on your team who are **guaranteed** _not_ to be trolls. This brings down the chances of seeing a troll down by a hefty **_60%_**.

As for calming down, just take a break after each game. Playing after a frustrating experience will make you perform worse. Have a snack, ~~do some stretches,~~ watch a youtube video, get a drink.

You need help.Killing yourself over a game?...........
you need srs help bro
